object_type.description: Registry slug identifying the referenced object class.

object_id.description: Canonical identifier of the referenced object.

uri.description: Optional URI for dereferencing the object, supports kki:// and external schemes.

display_name.description: Optional human-readable label for presentation contexts.

relationship.description: Optional slug describing how the host field relates to the referenced object.

version.description: Optional monotonic version or revision number for the object.

notes.description: Optional rich text notes capturing provenance or context for the link.
